item.title: From the Depths Tour Dates
item.content_encoded: Today anarcho-punk maniacs From the Depths are embarking on their summer tour, taking with them tremendous quantities of books and free literature. They'll be presenting a range of direct action, self-defense, and health care workshops, and are traveling in a truck that runs on vegetable oil so as to be able to play as many benefit shows for local grassroots projects as possible. To reach them for further information about any of these shows, or to invite them to your town, email booking@fromthedepths.info. Lyrics, downloadable artwork, and tour updates are all available at www.fromthedepths.info.

wp_comment.wp_comment_content:
Hey folks, here is some audio of the band taken from a recent show in Des Moines, Iowa. It was a really amazing show. This band will do great things.
audio: http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=69cf0ead095fb35595af63b7d44918aa1ab0b95636309074
